attributes.action: Continue with the proposal to give rights to cohabiting couples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Marriage is an outdated institution. 
If a couple live together for years, they can reasonably be assumed to be committed to each other.
Why should they be denied rights because they don't wish to go through with the ridiculous, outdated, sexist "tradition"? It's highly hypocritical to have a religious ceremony if you are not religious.
